channel.title: CVE Feed for Istmo Plugins -- Instant Chat Floating Button for WordPress Websites
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Istmo Plugins -- Instant Chat Floating Button for WordPress Websites

item.title: CVE-2024-44018|2024-10-07T14:28:58.999Z -- istmo%20plugins -- instant%20chat%20floating%20button%20for%20wordpress%20websites
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Istmo Plugins Instant Chat Floating Button for WordPress Websites allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Instant Chat Floating Button for WordPress Websites: from n/a through 1.0.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-44018|2024-10-05T12:16:05.596Z -- istmo%20plugins -- instant%20chat%20floating%20button%20for%20wordpress%20websites
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Istmo Plugins Instant Chat Floating Button for WordPress Websites allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Instant Chat Floating Button for WordPress Websites: from n/a through 1.0.5.
